byline.contributor: Fazal Muzhary contributed reporting from Kabul; Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan; and Thom Shanker from Washington.

abstract: Afghan officials say Hafiz Saeed Khan, senior militant leading Afghanistan and Pakistan unit of Islamic State, was killed in airstrike in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The death of the senior militant, Hafiz Saeed Khan, in an airstrike Friday was reported by Afghan officials but could not be confirmed independently.

headline.main: U.S. Strike Is Said to Kill Senior ISIS Militant in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: U.S. Strike Is Said to Kill an ISIS Leader in Afghanistan

snippet: The death of the senior militant, Hafiz Saeed Khan, in an airstrike Friday was reported by Afghan officials but could not be confirmed independently.
